sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_CORP_CODE', 0, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_STND_GUBN', 1, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_STND_DEGR', 2, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'C', '100', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_SEQ0', 3, 'SEQ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEMPK', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_PROC_GUBN', 4, '공정구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_WASH_CODE', 5, '세척구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_OUT0_MIN0', 6, '압출외경 MIN', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '160', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_OUT0_MAX0', 7, '압출외경 MAX', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '160', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_NET0_MIN0', 8, 'NET길이 MIN', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '180', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_NET0_MAX0', 9, 'NET길이 MAX', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '180', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_NET0_CYTM', 10, 'NET CT', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_NET0_COEF1', 11, 'NET 계수1', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '140', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_NET0_COEF2', 12, 'NET 계수2', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '140', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_APPL_GUBN', 13, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_REMK', 14, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'C', '120', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_UPDT_CMAN', 15, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_UPDT_DATE', 16, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_INIT_CMAN', 17, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSW', 'HOSW_INIT_DATE', 18, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 21:35:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBHOSW ( HOSW_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4) ,HOSW_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSW_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10) ,HOSW_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,HOSW_PROC_GUBN VARCHAR(8) ,HOSW_WASH_CODE VARCHAR(8) ,HOSW_OUT0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSW_OUT0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSW_NET0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSW_NET0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSW_NET0_CYTM NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSW_NET0_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,HOSW_NET0_COEF2 NUMBER(20, 6) ,HOSW_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSW_REMK VARCHAR(200) ,HOSW_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,HOSW_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8) ,HOSW_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,HOSW_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBHOSW_PK PRIMARY KEY( HOSW_CORP_CODE ,HOSW_STND_GUBN ,HOSW_STND_DEGR ,HOSW_SEQ0 ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
